description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Tallis's Illustrated London: in commemoration of the Great Exhibition of ... 1851. ... With historical and descriptive letter-press, by W. G" Author: Gaspey, William Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10349.cc.15." Volume: 01 Page: 451 Place of Publishing: London [printed], and New York Date of Publishing: 1851 Publisher: J. Tallis & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001373445 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
